i.name: Illumination
i.description: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for 6 seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.

q.name: Light Binding
q.description: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.

w.name: Prismatic Barrier
w.description: Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.

e.name: Lucent Singularity
e.description: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.

r.name: Final Spark
r.description: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. If Final Spark helps take down a champion, part of its cooldown is refunded. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.

riot.name: Illumination
riot.description: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for 6 seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.

i1.name: Illumination
i1.blurb: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for 6 seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Lux's''' offensive [[Champion ability|abilities]] mark all affected enemies with light energy for 6 seconds.
i1.description2: Her [[basic attack]]s and {{ai|Final Spark|Lux}} consume the mark, dealing {{pp|20 to 190}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}.

riot.name: Light Binding
riot.description: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.
riot.tooltip: Fires a ball of light, rooting up to two enemies for {{ e3 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage to each.

q1.name: Light Binding
q1.blurb: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lux''' releases a sphere of light in a line that deals {{as|magic damage}} to the first two enemies hit and {{tip|root|roots}} them for 2 seconds.
notes: * Targets affected by a {{tip|spell shield}} or by {{ai|Black Shield|Morgana}} count towards ''Light Binding's'' two-target limit.

riot.name: Prismatic Barrier
riot.description: Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.
riot.tooltip:
Throws Lux's wand in target direction, shielding her and all allied Champions it touches from {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for 3 seconds.

Upon reaching its destination, it returns to Lux, shielding her and all allied Champions it touches for an additional {{ effect2amount*2.0 }} (+{{ charabilitypower2.0 }}) damage for 3 seconds.

w1.name: Prismatic Barrier
w1.blurb: Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lux''' launches her wand in the target direction which returns to her after reaching maximum range.
w1.description2: The outgoing wand {{tip|shield|shields}} '''Lux''' and all allied champions it touches for 3 seconds.
w1.description3: The returning wand shields for twice the amount, for the same duration, while also stacking with the outgoing shield and resetting its duration.
w1.description4: ''The shields can only stack up to 2 times. Additional shields will neither reset the duration nor strengthen it.''
notes: * If ''Lux'' dies before her wand changes direction it will fizzle upon reaching maximum range.
* ''Lux's'' wand decelerates on the way out and accelerates on the way back.

riot.name: Lucent Singularity
riot.description: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.
riot.tooltip:
Creates a zone that slows enemies by {{ e1 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds the zone detonates dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Activate again to detonate early.

e1.name: Lucent Singularity
e1.blurb: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lux''' sends an anomaly of twisted light to the target area, {{tip|slow|slowing}} nearby enemies and granting {{tip|sight}} of the area around it for up to 5 seconds.
e1.description2: At the end of the duration or if ''Lucent Singularity'' is activated again, the singularity detonates, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies in the area.
notes: * '''Lux''' can re-cast ''Lucent Singularity'' in flight to detonate on arrival.
* ''Lucent Singularity'' grants {{tip|sight}} while in flight and while on the ground.
* The slow lingers for {{fd|0.25}} seconds after leaving the area of effect and after detonation.
* If ''Lux'' dies while ''Lucent Singularity'' is on the field or in flight, it will remain for the full duration and cannot be detonated early.

riot.name: Final Spark
riot.description: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. If Final Spark helps take down a champion, part of its cooldown is refunded. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.
riot.tooltip:
Fires a dazzling ray of light dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in a line. Enemy champions that die within {{ e4 }} seconds of being hit by Final Spark refund {{ e3 }}% of its cooldown.

Final Spark ignites and refreshes the Illumination debuff.

r1.name: Final Spark
r1.blurb: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. If Final Spark kills a champion, part of its cooldown is refunded. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lux''' winds up for 1 second to fire a giant laser in a line that deals {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit, briefly {{tip|sight|revealing}} them as well as the surrounding area.
r1.description2: If ''Final Spark'' hits at least one enemy champion that dies within {{fd|1.75}} seconds, a percentage of its maximum cooldown is refunded.
notes: * '''Lux''' cannot use any ability, summoner spell, or activate any item while casting.
* '''Lux''' can reactivate {{ai|Lucent Singularity|Lux}} while casting her ultimate.
* If '''Lux''' is {{tip|airborne|displaced}} while casting, ''Final Spark'' will fire from her original location.
* ''Final Spark'' only goes on cooldown when it fires and not when '''Lux''' starts casting. If she dies while casting, ''Final Spark'' will not go on cooldown.
